Miscellaneous Highlights: Dyson Daniels denies making gun gesture at the Pelicans while celebrating a 3-pointer in a Hawks win.
Others: Pelicans players asked officials to assess Daniels a technical foul for unsportsmanlike conduct.
Larry Nance Jr. had some back and forth with the Pelicans bench, including a third-quarter dunk and a corner 3.
Garrison Matthews received a flagrant foul for a hard forearm to mid-section of Jose Alvarado.
Dyson Daniels returned from a two-game absence due to a right hip strain.
